sources.title: The Great Flamarion
sources.description: Erich von Stroheim is The Great Flamarion, a marksman who employs Mary Beth Hughes and Dan Duryea, a married couple, for his vaudeville act. Having decided to rid herself of her husband, Mary Beth plots to trick von Stroheim into doing the dirty work for her.

sources.title: The Great Flamarion (1945) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: The Great Flamarion is a 1945 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: The Great Flamarion (1945) [P&M] 480p (830MB)
sources.description: This is the highest-quality version of this film that I was able to find online -- in this case, on bittorrent. At the time of uploading, this far exceeds the quality of the only other version currently available on the Internet Archive. Thank you to whoever it was that originally ripped and seeded the torrent for this version of the film! Uploading it here should make it easier to access.

sources.title: The Great Flamarion (1945)
sources.description: A beautiful but unscrupulous female performer manipulates all the men in her life in order to achieve her aims. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-great-flamarion-1945/

sources.title: The Great Flamarion (1945) FILM NOIR
sources.description:
Stars: Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes, Dan Duryea 
Director: Anthony Mann
Writer: Vicki Baum (novel)

An arrogant vaudeville sharpshooter falls under the spell of his promiscuous assistant who tricks him into accidentally killing her husband. When the double-dealing vixen runs off as soon as the dirty deed is done, the marksman vows to get even!

metadata.Plot: Flamarion, expert marksman, is entertaining people in a show which features Connie, beautiful woman and her husband Al. Flamarion and Connie fall in love and decide to get rid of the alcoholic husband.
metadata.Writer: Anne Wigton, Heinz Herald, Richard Weil
metadata.Actors: Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes, Dan Duryea
